quooz.server.user

Class AuthorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • quooz.server.user.AuthorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, AuthorHandlerInterface

    public class AuthorHandler
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements AuthorHandlerInterface
    The Class AuthorHandler manages everything related to the authors from the login to the logout
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ClientInterface> loggedAuthors
      HashMap which contains the list of the author currently logged in the game, represented by a pair of values .
